18#include "tools.h"
19
20static int _vgmknodes_single(struct cmd_context *cmd, struct logical_volume *lv,
21 void *handle __attribute((unused)))
22{
23 if (arg_count(cmd, refresh_ARG) && lv_is_visible(lv))
24 if (!lv_refresh(cmd, lv)) {
25 stack;
26 return ECMD_FAILED;
27 }
28
29 if (!lv_mknodes(cmd, lv)) {
30 stack;
31 return ECMD_FAILED;
32 }
33
34 return ECMD_PROCESSED;
35}
36
37int vgmknodes(struct cmd_context *cmd, int argc, char **argv)
38{
39 if (!lv_mknodes(cmd, NULL)) {
40 stack;
41 return ECMD_FAILED;
42 }
43
44 return process_each_lv(cmd, argc, argv, LCK_VG_READ, NULL,
45 &_vgmknodes_single);
46}
47
